Package uniandes.unacloud.web.pmallocators

In this package are located all allocator algorithms to assign executions to physical machines.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BestFitAllocator
    Class to execute Best Fit allocator algorithms It sorts physical machines based in available resources, assigns an execution in first machine in list and sorts again.
    ExecutionAllocator
    Abstract class with main methods to allocate deployments.
    FirstFitAllocator
    Class to execute First Fit allocator algorithms Assigns all possible executions for each physical machine based in available resources
    FirstFitDecreasingAllocator
    Class to execute Best Fit allocator algorithms It sorts physical machines based in available resources, assigns an execution in first machine in list and sorts again.
    PhysicalMachineAllocationDescription
    Class used to represent physical machine resources
    RandomAllocator
    Class to execute Random allocator algorithms Assigns an execution to a physical machine based in random number.
    RoundRobinAllocator
    Class to execute Round Robin allocator algorithms Assigns an execution for each physical machine order by physical machine id
    SingletonAllocator
    Class to execute Singleton allocator algorithms Assigns only one execution for each physical machine
    SortingAllocator
    Class to execute Sorting allocator algorithm Extends BEST FIT algorithm adding user as a variable in sort process
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AllocatorEnum
    represents types of allocator algorithms
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AllocatorException
    Exception to manage errors in Allocator algorithms

Package uniandes.unacloud.web.pmallocators Description

In this package are located all allocator algorithms to assign executions to physical machines.
Author:
CesarF
